document.full_text: the u.s. government should rethink plans for a multi-billion dollar plutonium complex at los alamos after the recent nuclear catastrophe in japan and the discovery of increased seismic risk in new mexico, nuclear watchdog groups said.
document.title: nuclear watchdog groups slam new mexico plan
lines_and_colors: the u.s. government should rethink plans for a multi-billion dollar plutonium complex at los alamos after the recent nuclear catastrophe in japan and the discovery of increased seismic risk in new mexico, nuclear watchdog groups said.
